cgcloud__Product_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Product_Template__c
cgcloud__Product_Template__c.description: Stores the details of the product template object that's used for products.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates whether the Product Assortment template is active.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Price_Required__c.description: Controls whether a price is to be assigned to the product.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the product template belongs.
